revised_title: Stability of Viscous Flow Between Rotating Cylinders: Asymptotic Integrals and Transformations
tldr: This article explores the stability of viscous flow between rotating cylinders using asymptotic integrals and transformations. The authors derive the critical points and auxiliary equations, and then find the transformations of the asymptotic integrals in passing through these critical points. The study is important for understanding problems of viscous flow at high Reynolds numbers.
